title: Diplomat

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - Visit a player, if you don't pick one or submit one you already visited, a random valid one is picked instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are alive and only one evil role can stop your team's win condition, they are instantly converted into your team.
- If you have visited at least (50% rounded down + 1) non-town players of a faction in the game while they were alive, you are instantly converted into their faction.
- You may be converted into a neutral, you will learn the role of an alive neutral and win if they also win, this prioritizes **Killing > Evil > All others** subalignments.

desc:
Post 5413
*"7 murder counts and many reports of vandalism, your little gang of sorts has been thought a lot, but have you considered just not doing it?"*
